description: three children in foreground on street; two boys in front--boy at right wearing striped shirt holding a bottle (?) resting on PR shoulder, boy at left seen 3/4 from back, wearing a white tank top; child in LLC squatting in street; other figures, adults and children, on sidewalks and walking on streets; buildings
